detail_desc: Jacket in soft velour with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Romper suit in fine-knit cotton with frills at the top, shoulder straps, buttons at the back and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with buttons at the back of the neck, front pockets and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a roll-edge neckline and a decorative frill at the top. Button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, decorative ties at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined, padded bikini top with gathers at the front, overlocked frill trims and side support. Ties at the back and detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Fully lined, padded bikini top with gathers at the front, overlocked frill trims and side support. Ties at the back and detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Fully lined, padded bikini top with gathers at the front, overlocked frill trims and side support. Ties at the back and detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Sports vest tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck. Light lift.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck. Light lift.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Lace body with microfibre details, a V-neck and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Seam under the bust, cutaway coverage at the back, a lined gusset and press-studs at the crotch.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. One patterned pair.
Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. One patterned pair.
Short shorts in soft, washed denim with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a layer of lace at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Treggings in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a gathered yoke and a frill trim around the armholes. Unlined.
Dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a gathered yoke and a frill trim around the armholes. Unlined.
Dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a gathered yoke and a frill trim around the armholes. Unlined.
Dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a gathered yoke and a frill trim around the armholes. Unlined.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Dress in patterned denim with a button placket, open chest pocket, a gathered seam at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Gilet in faux fur with a concealed fastening and decorative bow at the front. Satin lining.
Gilet in faux fur with a concealed fastening and decorative bow at the front. Satin lining.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, corduroy shorts and a pair of fine-knit tights. Top with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back. Shorts with a fake fly, button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, corduroy shorts and a pair of fine-knit tights. Top with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back. Shorts with a fake fly, button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and skinny legs with sewn-in pleats down the sides.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with press-studs at the sides and straps with adjustable fasteners. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and elasticated hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with press-studs at the sides and straps with adjustable fasteners. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and elasticated hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.
Platform sandals in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 13.5 cm.
Platform sandals in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 13.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, double straps at the sides and a high-cut at the back.
Satin mules with a striped foot strap with a decorative bow. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Mules with a wide foot strap in plastic. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 6.5 cm.
Satin sandals with a heel strap and narrow straps that cross over the foot, some of which are decorated with sparkly stones. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, approx. 7 cm.
Satin sandals with a heel strap and narrow straps that cross over the foot, some of which are decorated with sparkly stones. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, approx. 7 cm.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with an opening at the front and short flounced sleeves. V-neck at the back with a flounce at the top and a concealed zip. Seam at the waist and wide legs.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with an opening at the front and short flounced sleeves. V-neck at the back with a flounce at the top and a concealed zip. Seam at the waist and wide legs.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a wrapover front with a decorative metal ring and tie at the side, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt leg pockets and a back pocket.
Cropped top in a soft rib knit with wide shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with sequins, elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sun visor in braided straw with a woven top and wide elastic strap with a metal fastener at the back.
Sun visor in braided straw with a woven top and wide elastic strap with a metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch slub jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell.
Ski gloves in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with a print motif and reinforced palms. Elastication and a hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Thinsulate™ lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
